channel.title: City of Felliz - development
channel.description:
yes, im working on another server. what should be the name mmk? Felliz pk or City of Felliz?
server base: Phonescape
ne ways i added this: new starting postion deleted objects add many objects full ancients full normal magics dragon long and scimmy has attack emote thing. unlimited run changed some summoning (hehe) added stalls (need to add cases for it). change xp rate (450 per npc hit)
just think, this is like 8% done.
soon to come updates: fix ice barrage and all barrages fix some normal magic (hits to high) add shops add full specs add runecrafting add mining add farming add pc add a isle *v2* add wc and adds money change interfaces add autocasting disable mass clicking and suggestions i might add!!!!
[img]http://img527.imageshack.us/img527/7901/adromhy2.jpg[/img]

LOL i’m just saying,dont change it now,see for past 2 days what people think/choose,then choose the most vote,but i think the greaty of odd people hates pking server.

i made it a norm server…very easy…
so im gonna go with city of Felliz.
but ne ways, any suggestions?
